com.example.mobilibrary

Class customBookAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Book>
        • com.example.mobilibrary.customBookAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter

    public class customBookAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Book>
implements android.widget.Filterable
    Author:
    Jill, Sooraj; This is a custom book adapter to display all the books grabbed from Firestore, based on certain criteria (which comes from the activity it is used in).
